name: Five Nights At Sonic's 5: The First Chapter
name_original: Five Nights At Sonic's 5: The First Chapter
description:
Five Nights At Sonic's 5: The First Chapter is a game developed by Ionnizer. It came out on 22-01-2022.
You can play Five Nights At Sonic's 5: The First Chapter on PC. The game is sold via itch.io.
